sentences.en: Beef. But I like seafood best of all.
sentences.cn: 牛肉. 不过我最喜欢海鲜.

sentences.en: I have a table reserved at the Seafood Restaurant.
sentences.cn: 我在海鲜餐馆预订了一桌菜.

sentences.en: I was brought up near the sea, so I like seafood.
sentences.cn: 我是在海边长大的, 所以我喜欢海鲜.

sentences.en: John does seafood dishes very well.
sentences.cn: 约翰的海鲜菜肴烧得很好.

sentences.en: Oh, I'm fond of seafood and fish.
Seafood is a speciality on the island.
Seafood soup is a good appetizer.
sentences.cn: 海鲜汤是一道很好的开胃菜。

sentences.en: Shrimps are a popular type of seafood.
sentences.cn: 小虾是比较普遍的一种海味.

sentences.en: The fish or seafood is heavily salted with pure sodium chloride.
sentences.cn: 鱼或海鲜被抹了厚厚的纯盐腌制起来。

sentences.en: The waterfront restaurant serves good seafood.
sentences.cn: 这家滨水餐馆供应很好的海鲜.

sentences.en: There's an excellent seafood restaurant near here.
sentences.cn: 离这儿不远有家非常不错的海鲜馆.

sentences.en: When it comes to seafood, I like shrimp the best.
sentences.cn: 说到海鲜, 我最喜欢虾.

sentences.en: With oysters, as with all seafood, freshness equals quality.
sentences.cn: 就牡蛎而言，和其他所有海味一样，新鲜就决定了品质。

trans.tran_en: animals from the sea that you can eat, for example fish and  shellfish
